tool.name: mageTab
tool.command: mageTab.py #if $expDesign != "individual_genetic_characteristics_design": '$expDesign' #end if #if $expDesignOntology != "MGED Ontology": '$expDesignOntology' #end if #if $expDesignFactorName != "somatic_variant": '$expDesignFactorName' #end if #if $expDesignFactorType != "disease_state": '$expDesignFactorType' #end if #if $personLastName != "Radenbaugh": '$personLastName' #end if #if $personFirstName != "Amie": '$personFirstName' #end if #if $personMidInitial != "J": '$personMidInitial' #end if #if $personEmail != "aradenba@soe.ucsc.edu": '$personEmail' #end if #if $personAddress != "University of California Santa Cruz, 1156 High St, Mail Stop CBSE, Santa Cruz, CA 95064, USA": '$personAddress' #end if #if $personAffiliation != "University of California Santa Cruz Genome Institute": '$personAffiliation' #end if #if $personRole != "submitter": '$personRole' #end if #if $pubMedId != "25405470": '$pubMedId' #end if #if $pubAuthors != "Radenbaugh AJ, Ma S, Ewing A, Stuart JM, Collisson EA, Zhu J, Haussler D": '$pubAuthors' #end if #if $pubTitle != "RADIA: RNA and DNA Integrated Analysis for Somatic Mutation Detection": '$pubTitle' #end if #if $pubStatus != "published": '$pubStatus' #end if #if $expDescription != "Detection of somatic variants from the TCGA Whole-Exome Sequencing (WES) and RNA-Seq data using RADIA": '$expDescription' #end if #if $protocolNames != "ucsc.edu:variant_calling:Illumina_DNASeq:01,ucsc.edu:vcf2maf:Illumina_DNASeq:01": '$protocolNames' #end if #if $protocolTypes != "Variant Calling,MAF Generation": '$protocolTypes' #end if #if $protocolDescriptions != "Somatic Variant Calling Pipeline: RADIA v1.1.1 (https://github.com/aradenbaugh/radia/),Annotation: SnpEff v3.3_GRCh37.69 (http://snpeff.sourceforge.net/)": '$protocolDescriptions' #end if #if $protocolOntologies != "MGED Ontology,MGED Ontology": '$protocolOntologies' #end if #if $protocolParameters != "": '$protocolParameters' #end if #if $ontologyName != "MGED Ontology": '$ontologyName' #end if #if $ontologyFile != "http://mged.sourceforge.net/ontologies/MGEDontology.php": '$ontologyFile' #end if #if $ontologyVersion != "1.3.1.1": '$ontologyVersion' #end if #if $disease != "": -d '$disease' #end if #if $logLevel != "WARNING": -l '$logLevel' #end if -g '$logFilename'

param.name: expDesignOntology
param.help: the experimental design term source reference (e.g. MGED, HUGO, etc.

param.name: personAddress
param.value: University of California Santa Cruz, 1156 High St, Mail Stop CBSE, Santa Cruz, CA 95064, USA

param.name: personAffiliation
param.value: University of California Santa Cruz Genome Institute

param.name: pubAuthors
param.value: Radenbaugh AJ, Ma S, Ewing A, Stuart JM, Collisson EA, Zhu J, Haussler D

param.name: pubTitle
param.value: RADIA: RNA and DNA Integrated Analysis for Somatic Mutation Detection

param.name: expDescription
param.value: Detection of somatic variants from the TCGA Whole-Exome Sequencing (WES) and RNA-Seq data using RADIA

param.name: protocolDescriptions
param.value: Somatic Variant Calling Pipeline: RADIA v1.1.1 (https://github.com/aradenbaugh/radia/),Annotation: SnpEff v3.3_GRCh37.69 (http://snpeff.sourceforge.net/)

param.name: disease
param.help: a disease abbreviation (e.g. BRCA), will be taken from VCF header if available

param.name: logLevel
param.help: the logging level (DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL), %default by default

param.name: logFilename
param.help: the name of the log file, STDOUT by default

tool.help: usage: python %prog vcfDir protectedIDFFilename protectedSDRFFilename protectedArchiveName openAccessIDFFilename openAccessSDRFFilename openAccessArchiveName [Options]
